biography: Chloé Louise Booyens is an actress. Her love of performance started at 3 through RAD Ballet classes. Booyens began her professional acting career in 2015 whilst studying at Cambridge University, and has appeared in numerous roles since including Whirpool (2017), Olhouser (2018) and Jawaani Jaaneman (2019). She made her West End debut in Agatha Christie's Witness for the Prosecution from November 2018 to May 2019.
name: Chloé Booyens
